attributes.action: Implement 'Focused Protection' (Great Barrington Declaration) method for COVID19
attributes.additional_details: Public health is being put at risk in a number of ways due to the current government approach to COVID19 - both physically and mentally. The Great Barrington Declaration was released by three scientists from across the world and has been signed by thousands of scientists. This proposes a well reasoned and thought out scientific approach to protecting those most at risk from COVID19 whilst protecting against the harm caused by the current approach (like fewer cancer screenings).
attributes.background: Allow normal life to resume for the general public whilst implementing methods to protect the most vulnerable in society from COVID19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
